DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine help manage weight gain pregnancy . This study part National Consortium 'LIFE-Moms : Lifestyle intervention expectant mom ' . LIFE-Moms 7 study funded test different lifestyle intervention overweight obese pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Personalized Management Body Weight During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: The study last 22 month , screen study completion . The entire study include 3 screen visit , receipt weight management advice , second trimester testing , third trimester test three follow visit first year baby bear . Participants randomly assign 1 3 program help manage weight pregnancy : 1 . Physician Directed group 2 . SmartMoms-Clinic group 3 . SmartMoms-Phone group
DOC.criteria: Are pregnant . Are 18 40 year old . Have BMI ( number calculate height weight ) equal 25kg/m2 . Establish prenatal care 12 week pregnancy . Can read , speak understand English . Do plan deliver baby Woman 's Hospital , Baton Rouge , LA Are pregnant one infant . Have habitually smoke last 6 month . Currently abuse abused illegal prescription drug last 6 month . Consume 2 alcoholic drink per week . Are unwilling avoid pregnancy 12 month follow delivery . Are unwilling enroll baby 12 month followup test plan study . Are plan move area within next 2 year plan study area 1 month next year . Are unwilling assigned random intervention group . Are plan terminate pregnancy . Are plan give baby adoption . Are pregnant baby know fetal anomaly . Have reason exercise unsafe ( determined physician study staff ) . Have plan bariatric surgery within 1 year expect delivery . Currently history follow : 3 first trimester miscarriage High blood pressure Type 1 diabetes Diagnosis pregnancy relate diabetes screen HIV AIDS Psychotic disorder , major depressive episode , bipolar disorder eat disorder Any pregnancy , blood , heart , lung , hormone , digestive problem doctor considers unsafe participation study
